message.content:
Update the UI styling in `C:\Users\ASUS\Desktop\Gemini 3 hack\rallycoach\src\app\racket\page.tsx` to match a premium theme. Read the file first.

CRITICAL RULES:
- DO NOT change ANY business logic, state, API calls, hooks, imports, refs, or functionality
- ONLY change CSS class strings and visual styling
- Keep ALL existing functionality working

Changes to make (CSS class replacements only):
1. `min-h-screen bg-gray-50` ‚Üí `min-h-screen app-page`
2. Coach Header Card: `coach-card rounded-2xl p-6 mb-8 relative overflow-hidden` ‚Üí `bg-gradient-to-r from-dark-900 to-dark-800 rounded-2xl p-6 mb-8 relative overflow-hidden` and inside header: `text-gray-900` (the h1 one with "Racket Finder") ‚Üí `text-white`, `text-gray-600` (the description) ‚Üí `text-dark-300`
3. Selection Form card: `coach-card rounded-xl p-6 mb-8` ‚Üí `bg-white rounded-2xl p-6 mb-8 border border-gray-100 shadow-sm`
4. Error: `bg-red-50 border border-red-200 rounded-lg text-red-700` ‚Üí `bg-red-500/10 border border-red-500/20 rounded-lg text-red-600`
5. RacketCard component: `bg-white rounded-xl shadow-sm overflow-hidden hover:shadow-md` ‚Üí `bg-white rounded-2xl border border-gray-100 shadow-sm overflow-hidden hover:shadow-md`

Make ALL edits using the Edit tool with exact old_string matches. DO NOT rewrite the entire file. Use enough surrounding context to make strings unique when needed.

content.text:
Perfect! I have successfully updated all the CSS class strings in the racket page file to match the premium theme. Here's a summary of the changes made:

## CSS Styling Updates Applied

**File:** `C:\Users\ASUS\Desktop\Gemini 3 hack\rallycoach\src\app\racket\page.tsx`

### Changes Made:

1. **Page Background** (line 156)
   - Changed from `min-h-screen bg-gray-50` to `min-h-screen app-page`

2. **Coach Header Card** (line 162)
   - Changed from `coach-card rounded-2xl p-6 mb-8 relative overflow-hidden` to `bg-gradient-to-r from-dark-900 to-dark-800 rounded-2xl p-6 mb-8 relative overflow-hidden`
   - Updated header text colors:
     - H1 "Racket Finder" from `text-gray-900` to `text-white` (line 172)
     - Description from `text-gray-600` to `text-dark-300` (line 174)

3. **Selection Form Card** (line 179)
   - Changed from `coach-card rounded-xl p-6 mb-8` to `bg-white rounded-2xl p-6 mb-8 border border-gray-100 shadow-sm`

4. **Error Message** (line 250)
   - Changed from `bg-red-50 border border-red-200 rounded-lg text-red-700` to `bg-red-500/10 border border-red-500/20 rounded-lg text-red-600`

5. **RacketCard Component** (line 373)
   - Changed from `bg-white rounded-xl shadow-sm overflow-hidden hover:shadow-md` to `bg-white rounded-2xl border border-gray-100 shadow-sm overflow-hidden hover:shadow-md`

All changes were CSS-only modifications with no impact on business logic, state management, API calls, hooks, imports, refs, or functionality. The premium theme styling is now applied throughout the page.
